name: CreaTheRope
description:
Rules: Give the candy to the green thing by using gravity force and momentum with the rope.

Controls: Touch anywhere the rope to cut it.

This is a student project made for homework during christmas hollyday. The subject was to make 10 levels by using mechanics of the famous mobile game Cut The Rope by ZeptoLab in order to understand 2D physics and level loading of Unity.

Executable app and source project (including scripts and Unity assets) are available to download.

I will try to make a WebGL and mobile (Android) version ASAP!
